title: War SFX Pack (Gunshots, Explosions)
description: A package of sound effects, gunshots, Explosions, and also futuristic shots and their reloading, perfect for your war game
longDescription:
SFX Playlist: SoundCloud

-----------

What's in the package:

81 sounds of gunshot

43 sounds of weapon reloading

86 sounds of Futuristic Gun Shots

40 sounds of Futuristic Reload

------------------------------------------------------------

A package of sound effects, Gunshots, Explosions, and also futuristic shots and their reloading, perfect for your war game  

------------------------------------------------------------

Hello, my name is Pavel also called Graninbeatz, I am a music composer and sound designer, I have worked in various game development companies, I am open for cooperation - Graninbeatz@gmail.com  

questions, news, suggestions what to add and more other is in discord group

Discord channel: https://discord.gg/SWJkbWsppX

Email: Graninbeatz@gmail.com

Instagram: pavel_granin1
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  High quality 
  •  Recorded on a quality microphone in stereo 
  •  Synthesized

Number of Audio Waves: 353

Number of Audio Cues: 353

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 15

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: No
